## Overview 
This case study uses data on solar development  data from the National Renewable Energy Lab's [Screening Tool for Equitable Adoption and Deployment of Solar](https://data.nrel.gov/submissions/238) and energy burden data from the Department of Energy's [Low-Income Energy Affordability Data Tool](https://www.energy.gov/scep/slsc/lead-tool), and connecting it back to the five tenets of EJ. 

## Learning Outcomes
- Read spatial data and transform its projection 
- Create a Chloropleth Map
- Creating a Bivariate Map
- Connect findings to theoretical understandings of the five tenets of Environmental Justice
